title: Taurus Taliyah
body:
Continuing with the zodiac signs skinline...-drum rolls- Taliyah representing Taurus, so why Taliyah and not Alistar? well I based my pick on character traits other than visual traits.....Taliyah have a lot willpower (to not said she's stubborn) to the point she can bend the earth and control it...also how cool that ult would look? hope you guys dig the concept ty <3

https://imgur.com/HkBYUmZ

https://imgur.com/e4NmYsL

replies.body:
You say you are continuing with the zodiac skins, does that mean that you've made more concepts than this one?Cause I didn't find it in your board-history and would like to see the rest, because this one looks pretty cool.

And while I can understand that Alistar is kinda the obvious choice for a taurus skin I'd say it might be actually better this way because there isn't much of a point to give the bull skin to the bull champ.
[I found the artist's twitter. They've got the series there along with some concept sketches. ](https://twitter.com/o_oleu) Hope they don't mind me sharing the link.
hahhaa thanks <3 no problem at all

hi...well....I made aries it was this one....
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/i2EB0gLl-zodiac-patheon
Thinking W as a green/white bull coming up from the ground and head butting them whatever way. Looks cool my guy.
At this point, they could just spit on Taliyah and I'd buy it as a skin. This looks great.

This has to become a skin in game...but sadly Rioters dont come to boards posts.
Only moderators roam around the posts...no actual authority gives a flip about the board.
Lemme show how active moderators are.
This comment will be deleted in 2hours...but sadly no rioters will see this post in 2 years.

= Fuck you Riot.
{{sticker:vlad-salute}}
Bruh do you barely browse the boards or something because Riot most certainly does.
as a Taurus, I approve. that ultimate is fucking beautiful
I wish this skin had her side-skirting.  Many skins omit it, yet it’s essential to her outfit and silhouette.

The art overall is still fantastic! 
Small notice though, she seems to have some kind of Marvel-bow-thing going on with her right leg. It almost looks like you tried to give her an animal leg and stopped half-way. :/
The art overall is still fantastic!
And yes, the ult would be great. Rito, we need that ult! XD
I love the bottom image so much.
Dope 10/10 would buy if I had money
can't be more stubborn than mordekaiser, he basically said "F.... you" to death
